column4: hi, have a little problem with my xorg.conf (which works under gentoo, but) which troubles on ubuntu, on my notebook (i855gme-chip) the tft has a max resolution of 1024, but if a connect an crt on vga-out 1280 is possible on the crt, but i get this message: (1280x1024,m0) mode clock 100000MHz exceeds DDC maximum 140MHz
might be a refresh rate problem...are you sure your rates are correct?
the vertical refresh rate is settet to 60 in the xorg.conf (without this solid value its also doesnt work under gentoo)
in my opionen a ''Modeline'' could help, but how do i get it?
yeah, i'm not really sure about external displays actually.
